attributes.action: The Public want a hold on the plan to Ban the sale of fossil fueled vehicles.
attributes.additional_details: This Government has DICTATED this ban on the production of Fossil fuel Vehicles without the permission of the Electorate..!! If they enact this, without a pre vote manifesto at the next election it will be a violation of our Human Rights to our FREEDOM OF CHOICE.. Further to this, the Government KNOW that the average person cannot afford these vehicles and that they are NOT FIT FOR PURPOSE..!!!
attributes.background: The Government stop the Ban on Fossil fuel vehicles until the electorate are given a chance to Vote on it via a Manifesto that plainly outlines what their proposal is, the electorate MUST have a choice to vote. Without a chance to vote, the Government becomes nothing other than a "Dictatorship"..!!!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625673
